/usr/local/cuda-11.8/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler  --extended-lambda -Xcompiler -fPIC -g -g -G --generate-code=arch=compute_75,code=[compute_75,sm_75] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/test_finite_field.dir/test/test_finite_field.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/test_finite_field.dir/cmake_device_link.o  libgpu_hydra.a -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
